alert.note: Alert for Petroleum (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 11 at 3:29PM MDT until April 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 17 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Petroleum County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will be near zero at times. Expect extreme stress to newborn livestock..
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
